name: The Loft
description:
We are The Loft, a design agency based in the heart of Glasgow. We help our clients create inspiring brands using identity design, web design, graphic design, art-direction, video, social media communications and most importantly - a big idea!
‘Design with Soul’ is not just a tag-line,  it is a way of life. We uncover the ‘big idea’ lying at the heart of your brand and then bring it to life in the most imaginative way possible.
